DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety, pharmacokinetics, pharmacodynamics and antitumor activity in adult subjects with selected advanced solid tumor malignancies.
DOC.brief_title: MEDI5083 Alone and in Combination With Durvalumab in Subjects With Select Advanced Solid Tumors
DOC.detailed_description: This is a global Phase 1, first-time-in-human, multicenter, open-label, dose-escalation and dose-expansion study of MEDI5083 alone and in combination with durvalumab.

Active/prior autoimmune of inflammatory disorders 4. History of immunodeficiency, solid organ transplant, or tuberculosis 5. Known allergy/hypersensitivity to drug or components 6. Untreated central nervous system (CNS) metastatic disease, leptomeningeal disease, or cord compression 7. Current or prior use of immunosuppressive medication within 14 days prior to the first dose of MEDI5083
